Class FTPFileFilters

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFileFilters
public class FTPFileFilters extends Object
Implements some simple FTPFileFilter classes.
Since:
2.2

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final FTPFileFilter
    ALL
